author: markt
msg: Add javax.websocket.* to the classes for which the web application class loader will always delegate first (so the classes provided by Tomcat cannot be overridden).

author: markt
msg: Test 0.2 in loadClass(String, boolean) already ensures that Java SE classes can not be overridden and does so in a way that doesn't require a list of packages to be renamed.
The filter() method handles the similar requirement for the Java EE APIs Tomcat implements.

author: wrowe
msg: Replacement of ap_some_auth_required (unusable in Apache httpd 2.4)
with new ap_some_authn_required and ap_force_authn hook.

author: wrowe
msg: Replacement of ap_some_auth_required (unusable in Apache httpd 2.4)
with new ap_some_authn_required and ap_force_authn hook.
